channel.title: Game crashes while loading
channel.description:
I was able to play the game just fine up until the Office Complex chapter (specifically the parts in the freezer). When I saved there and wanted to play the game again the next day, the game now gets past the Crowbar Collective logo but crashes with a popping noise while loading with the Office Complex chapter background.
My specs are: OS: Ubuntu 18.04 bionic Kernel: x86_64 Linux 5.0.0-37-generic CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Eight-Core @ 16x 3GHz GPU: Radeon RX 580 Series OpenGL version string (glxinfo): 4.5 (Compatibility Profile) Mesa 19.0.8
I was unable to follow the instructions to obtain a crash dump, but based on the format of other crash reports, I was able to locate this information in my `/tmp/dumps` folder:
Uptime( 68.767784 ) SourceMod:0,DS:0,Crash:1
Map: background04 Game: /mnt/data/Steam/steamapps/common/Black Mesa/bms Build: 100001 Misc: skill:1 rate 80000 update 64 cmd 64 latency 0 msec Net: loopback cmdline:"/mnt/data/Steam/steamapps/common/Black Mesa/bms_linux" "-game" "bms" "+developer" "0" "-steam" "-windowed" "-width" "1600" "-height" "900" driver: Driver Name: X.Org (Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.27.0, 5.0.0-37-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)) 4.5 (Compatibility Profile) Mesa 19.0.8 - 1920x1080 Driver Version: 0.0.0.0 VendorId / DeviceId: 0x1 / 0x1 SubSystem / Rev: 0x0 / 0x0 DXLevel: gamemode [95] Vid: 1600 x 900 video: picmip: 0 forceansio: 1 trilinear: 0 antialias: 2 vsync: 0 rootlod: 0 reducefillrate: 0 shadowrendertotexture: 1 r_flashlightdepthtexture 1 waterforceexpensive: 1 waterforcereflectentities: 1 mat_motion_blur_enabled: 0 mat_queue_mode 0 OS: Ubuntu 5.0.0-37.40~18.04.1-generic 5.0.21 memallocfail? = 0 Active: active SpawnCount 1 MapLoad Count 1 Error count 0, end demo 0, abort count 0 Launching ""/mnt/data/Steam/steamapps/common/Black Mesa/bms_linux" "-game" "bms" "+developer" "0" "-steam" "-windowed" "-width" "1600" "-height" "900""

(sk_gonarch_flinch_cooldown) 5(46.887333): Parent cvar in server.dll not allowed (sk_gonarch_special_mode_spit_cooldown) 4(46.887316): Parent cvar in server.dll not allowed (sk_gonarch_special_mode_spit_cooldown) 3(46.885539): Parent cvar in server.dll not allowed (dev_gnwt_PhysAttack_InChase_1k) 2(46.879700): For FCVAR_REPLICATED, ConVar must be defined in client and game .dlls (sk_xen_tree_attack_rad) 1(46.878371): Parent cvar in server.dll not allowed (sk_xort_dispel_evil_forced_num_enemy_threshold)
I have tried switching the game from fullscreen to windowed mode via the `-windowed` launch option. In addition, I have tried verifying my game data via Steam. Both attempts did not work. Other Source games (CS:GO) seem to work fine.
I would be happy to provide more information if needed. Thank you in advance.
NOTE: I have also tried the public beta branch, which does not even start at all.

item.title: Game crashes while loading
item.dc:creator: Lignum
item.description:
I was able to play the game just fine up until the Office Complex chapter (specifically the parts in the freezer). When I saved there and wanted to play the game again the next day, the game now gets past the Crowbar Collective logo but crashes with a popping noise while loading with the Office Complex chapter background.

My specs are:
OS: Ubuntu 18.04 bionic
Kernel: x86_64 Linux 5.0.0-37-generic
CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Eight-Core @ 16x 3GHz
GPU: Radeon RX 580 Series
OpenGL version string (glxinfo): 4.5 (Compatibility Profile) Mesa 19.0.8

I was unable to follow the instructions to obtain a crash dump, but based on the format of other crash reports, I was able to locate this information in my /tmp/dumps folder:

Uptime( 68.767784 )
SourceMod:0,DS:0,Crash:1

Map: background04
Game: /mnt/data/Steam/steamapps/common/Black Mesa/bms
Build: 100001
Misc: skill:1 rate 80000 update 64 cmd 64 latency 0 msec
Net: loopback
cmdline:"/mnt/data/Steam/steamapps/common/Black Mesa/bms_linux" "-game" "bms" "+developer" "0" "-steam" "-windowed" "-width" "1600" "-height" "900"
driver: Driver Name:  X.Org (Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.27.0, 5.0.0-37-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)) 4.5 (Compatibility Profile) Mesa 19.0.8 - 1920x1080
Driver Version: 0.0.0.0
VendorId / DeviceId:  0x1 / 0x1
SubSystem / Rev:  0x0 / 0x0
DXLevel:  gamemode [95]
Vid:  1600 x 900
video: picmip: 0 forceansio: 1 trilinear: 0 antialias: 2 vsync: 0 rootlod: 0 reducefillrate: 0
shadowrendertotexture: 1 r_flashlightdepthtexture 1 waterforceexpensive: 1 waterforcereflectentities: 1 mat_motion_blur_enabled: 0 mat_queue_mode 0
OS: Ubuntu 5.0.0-37.40~18.04.1-generic 5.0.21
memallocfail? = 0
Active: active
SpawnCount 1 MapLoad Count 1
Error count 0, end demo 0, abort count 0
Launching ""/mnt/data/Steam/steamapps/common/Black Mesa/bms_linux" "-game" "bms" "+developer" "0" "-steam" "-windowed" "-width" "1600" "-height" "900""

I have tried switching the game from fullscreen to windowed mode via the -windowed launch option. In addition, I have tried verifying my game data via Steam. Both attempts did not work. Other Source games (CS:GO) seem to work fine.

I would be happy to provide more information if needed. Thank you in advance.

NOTE: I have also tried the public beta branch, which does not even start at all.
